DOC.brief_summary: Study Design : - A single center, open, randomized, single dose, two-period, two-treatment, two-sequence, crossover study Primary Objective: - To assess the bioequivalence of combination oral formulation of amlodipine/losartan versus two co-administered products containing amlodipine and losartan
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study of Amlodipine Plus Losartan Versus Amlodipine and Losartan
DOC.detailed_description: Secondary Objective: - To evaluate the safety and tolerability of these formulations.
DOC.criteria: Age 1855 years Healthy Caucasian volunteers Non smokers or mild smokers Exclusion criteria: Pregnancy and/or breastfeeding Participation in another clinical trial within 60 days prior to Period 1.
